oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A STRESS CORRECTION PROCEDURE FOR THE ANALYSIS OF INELASTIC FRAMES UNDER TRANSIENT DYNAMIC LOADS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MARUR, SR
KANT, T
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper attempts to present an algorithm (as a set of conditions and equations) for the correction of stresses of both strain-hardening and perfectly-plastic materials, for the analysis of frames under transient dynamic loadings. The validity of the proposed conditions and equations is verified through numerical experiments.
